ResearchProjectDef.label: Canning Factory
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches methods of making a automated machine to can foods to preserve them in metal. \n\nUnlocks the canning factory and ablity to make canned food and meals.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Canning Table
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches methods to can food to preserve them in metal. \n\nUnlocks the billable canning machine and ablity to make cannned food and meals.
